note.p: Farmer. Farmed at Chadbury, Worcestershire; known for his progressive methods. Bred greyhounds. Elected member of the council of the Royal Agricultural Society, 1861–88.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/2925/79/4)
Journal of the Royal Agricultural Society 2d ser. 24 (1888): 679–85
